name: 整点薯条 Get Some Fries
name_original: 整点薯条 Get Some Fries
description:
您现在看到的内容均为抢先体验版本 Everything on this page now is a preview version English (Click to show) “Where do you think we're headed?”
“I was going to go get some fries on the pier”
“No I mean the big picture — What is the culminating result of consciousness? Where does this path end?”
“I still feel like it has something to do with those fries on the pier”

—— https://falseknees.com/319.htmlHow can you live without fries?

There's nothing a bag of fries can't solve, and if there is, then get more fries.

There are a lot of robots on this beach, don't worry, they are all very friendly, and luckily, they opened a seagull's favorite fries store. If you can't open the door, get into the ventilation pipes, watch out for cameras, slowly sneak into the kitchen, and then ——

Get some fries!

Other than fries...

Don't only care about the fries.

There's so much more waiting for you besides fries! Watch silly robots forced to repeat purchasing food, find a radio for some music, and head to Seagull Land to find an RGB basketball for a cool shot! (Really hard to get the point, my friend.) In the meantime, you can find a way to open the telescope and look into it, find a useless broken boat, make the floating vehicle sound the alarm for you, and finally go kick some volleyball!

And if you don't know what to do, go back and look for your friend, he should still be standing there.

How to Play with Seagull?Guide for all robot!

[W][A][S][D] make the seagull walk around
[Space] make the seagull jump, hold to jump higher!
[F] pick up/drop small items, hold to throw it out
[E] interact with surrounding (when there's a [!] on seagull's head)
[TAB] hold to check surrouding

Made by

Everything in Unreal ZiduanSkeleton Mesh Master ZitengAnimation Master YEE CHENG
2D & 3D Artist Yichen
3D Artist Jingyi
VFX Pioneer Linjie
and LEVI CARPENTER

Thank you for playing!

中文（点击展开） “我们要飞向何方？”
“我打算待会儿去码头整点薯条”
“你误会我了伙计，我说的是咱们这一辈子的终极目标。归根结底，活着是为了什么？”
“为了待会儿去码头整点薯条”

—— https://falseknees.com/319.html
怎么能没有薯条

没有什么是一包薯条解决不了的问题，如果有，那就再来点薯条。

这一片海滩上有很多机器人，不用担心，他们都非常友善，而且好巧不巧，他们开了一家海鸥最爱的薯条店。打不开门就钻钻通风管，小心摄像头，慢慢潜入厨房，然后——

获得你最爱的薯条！

在薯条背后...

别让薯条蒙蔽了你的双眼！

除了薯条，还有很多事情等着你去做！看傻乎乎的机器人被迫重复消费，找到收音机来点轻松的音乐，还可以去海鸥乐园找到RGB篮球来一个炫酷的投篮！（真的很难投中，朋友）  与此同时，你可以想办法打开望远镜看看远处，找到一艘没用的破船，让浮空车为你响起警报，最后再去踢踢排球！

啊对了，玩累了就回去找找你的同伴吧，他应该还在那儿傻站着呢。

怎样和海鸥玩得开心?所有机器人必读指南

[W][A][S][D] 可以让海鸥听你的话四处走走
[空格键] 可以让海鸥跳起来，长按可以跳得更高！
[F] 可以拾取和放下小的物品，长按可以扔出去
[E] 可以和周围的物体交互（头上有感叹号的时候）
[TAB] 长按可以看看周围

制作

没日没夜爆肝UE的 Ziduan
骨骼模型大师 Ziteng
动画大师 YEE CHENG
2D & 3D 美术 Yichen
3D 美术 Jingyi
VFX 开疆拓土者 Linjie
以及 LEVI CARPENTER

最后感谢您的游玩。
